title: Venezuelan Boat Suspected of Drug Smuggling Is Said to Have Turned Before U.S. Strike

title: NATO Says It Scrambled Fighter Jets to Shoot Down Russian Drones Over Poland

title: Putin’s Message to Ukraine, Europe and Trump: I Won’t Back Down
summary: With escalating airstrikes, the Russian leader appears determined to demonstrate that he will dictate the terms for any end to the war.

title: Poland Has Invoked NATO’s Article 4. What Comes Next?
summary: Article 4 allows member states to start a formal discussion within the alliance about threats to their security. It does not commit the alliance to military action.

summary: Stephen Miran, a top economic adviser to the president, cleared a key Senate hurdle on Wednesday, putting him one step closer to a seat on the Federal Reserve.

title: Happy 10th Birthday to the Laser Interferometer Gravitational-Wave Observatory. Now Drop Dead.
summary: Ten years ago, astronomers made an epic discovery with the Laser Interferometer Gravitational-Wave Observatory. Cosmology hasn’t been the same since, and it might not stay that way much longer.

title: Polly Holliday, a Sassy Waitress on the Sitcom ‘Alice,’ Dies at 88

title: British Courts Service Destroys Banksy Mural Depicting Attack by Judge
